sentences.en: As the day wore on Brand found himself increasingly impressed.
sentences.cn: 白天慢慢过去，布兰德发现自己兴趣愈发浓厚。

sentences.en: Billy Sullivan had impressed me as a fine man.
sentences.cn: 比利·沙利文给我留下的印象是他是个很不错的人。

sentences.en: He was quite favourably impressed with the new French commander.
sentences.cn: 他对新的法国指挥官印象很好。

sentences.en: He was so impressed that he inquired the young shepherd's name.
sentences.cn: 他深受震动，就问那个年轻的牧羊人叫什么名字。
他走了，给人留下了不错的印象。

sentences.en: I impressed on him what a huge honour he was being offered.
sentences.cn: 我让他铭记他当时被授予了多么大的荣誉。

sentences.en: I'm very impressed with the new airport.
sentences.cn: 新机场给我留下了很深的印象。

sentences.en: I've impressed upon them the need for more professionalism.
sentences.cn: 我已使他们深刻认识到提高专业素养的必要性。

sentences.en: Jenkins whistled through his teeth, impressed at last.
sentences.cn: 詹金斯吹了声口哨，最终被打动了。

sentences.en: Montagu was extremely impressed by the splendours of the French court.
sentences.cn: 法国宫廷的豪华给蒙塔古留下了很深的印象。

sentences.en: She flicked her eyes up to make certain I was suitably impressed.
sentences.cn: 她抬眼瞟了瞟，以确定我不出所料地被打动了。

sentences.en: The great concourse of people seemed to have been similarly impressed.
sentences.cn: 这一大群人似乎也留下了同样深刻的印象。

sentences.en: There are two among their recent introductions that have greatly impressed me.
sentences.cn: 在他们最近引进的东西里面有两样给我留下了非常深刻的印象。

sentences.en: What impressed me more was that she knew Tennessee Williams.
sentences.cn: 让我印象更深的是她认识田纳西·威廉斯。

sentences.en: You'll be impressed with the brightness and the beauty of the colors.
sentences.cn: 色彩的明艳美丽会让你大饱眼福。

words.tran_cn: 印象深刻的；外加的；受感动的；了不起的

phrases.tran_cn: 被...所感动；被...给予深刻印象

trans.tran_cn: 使感动，使印象深刻( impress的过去式和过去分词)
